answers.answer: Post on the Depression forum and on the Ask a Doctor Forum under Mental Health. You'll get better assistance there than here.

question: Having had Depression before even being diagnosed (Diabetes type II) I can't get myself out of just not caring about it.I go to therapy, I'm on antidepressants.  I know how serious Diabetes is.........I just can't get going on the right path!  Please Help!
title: Going In Circles
